item.title: Protect Windows from Speculative Execution Side-Channel Attacks
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "Windows Spectre Meltdown Mitigation Script" , "Speculative Execution Side-Channel Attacks" , "Microsoft" , "Intel" , "AMD" , "VIA" , "ARM" , "Android" , "Chrome" , "iOS" , "macOS" , "Branch Target Injection" , "Bounds Check Bypass" , "Rogue Data Cache Load" , "Speculative Store Bypass" , "Microarchitectural Data Sampling" , "CVEs" , "Firmware Updates" , "GitHub Repository" , "PowerShell"
item.description: Learn how to safeguard your Windows system against speculative execution side-channel attacks with Microsoft's mitigation script and firmware updates
